response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation, and I believe it could significantly enrich your life or business in ways unforeseen. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $850,000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to own something truly exceptional at a discounted rate.
